name: Shrinking Planet (Brackeys)
description:
Feel the wind in your hair as you race through an ever-shrinking world. But be careful! Meteors are raining upon the planet.

Controls:

A and D to steer.

Made in 48 hours by: Brackeys - Asbjørn Thirslund.

Tools used

  • Unity 5.6 (C#)
  • Visual Studio
  • Photoshop CC
  • Blender
  • Adobe Audition
  • Bosca Ceoil
